cleaned_text: [Regular price $4.99](#Reviews-7949038420201) / For the days that need a boost, the Energy Blend diffuser ring is here to help! Our Energy Blend is infused with citrus oils lime and orange, to add a refreshing scent and provide clarity, as well as peppermint that invigorates and stimulates the mind. Aimed to reduce brain fog and to promote mental stamina, the Energy Blend diffuser ring will help you combat fatigue and feel energized while you use it.
